about_the_game:
Download this album as PDF.
This album lay in Vladimir’s locked closet for a very long time. Covered in dust and the smell of old pages and ink, he waited for you.
From this album you will learn more about Vladimir and his past.

All photographs in this album are photographs of subscribers, as well as the grandfather of the project director.

After installation
After purchasing and installing the DLC, the PDF album will be in the game folder where "I Know This Place..?" is installed.

For example, on Windows 10, this folder would typically be "C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\I Know This Place".

If you are unsure where game is installed, navigate to I Know This Place in the Steam library, right click and select "Properties...". Switch to the "Local files" tab in the window that pops up and press the "Browse local files..." button to open the folder where game is installed

name: Цифровой альбом Владимира

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or above
  • Processor: Intel/AMD
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Additional Notes: You need PDF viewer or JPG viewer
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or above
  • Processor: Intel/AMD
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Additional Notes: You need PDF viewer or JPG viewer
